resources.string: Be aware that not using default multiplier(25) might result in analog stick to reach highest value sooner or not being able to reach highest value at all. Small movements can be interpreted as a lot, or it can\'t be registered at all.
Adjust the value for sensor multiplier:
Adjust the value for touch multiplier:

" Be aware that not using default multiplier(25) might result in analog stick to reach highest value sooner or not being able to reach highest value at all. Small movements can be interpreted as a lot, or it can't be registered at all."

Lowering this will result in smoother output but will make the output delayed. Conversely, making this higher will result in faster output but it will have more jankiness. This setting will only matter if your device lacks precise sensors.
Adjust the value for smoothing multiplier:
This mode relies solely on Rotation sensors which your device doesn\'t have any suitable
Buttons will become available on successful connection.
Click the button again after giving the permission
Drag and drop or pinch buttons to configure layout.
Gravity and Rotation Vector Sensor is not available. Using Accelerometer as fallback.
Gravity Sensor is not available. Using Rotation Vector Sensor as fallback.
Phone rotation sensor data for left analog is enabled.
Phone rotation sensor data for left analog is disabled.
Use Edit Layout button to set a layout first.
Ad is not ready yet, please press the button again.
Ads only start to load when pressed. Press again in a bit.
Adjust the value for trigger touch multiplier:
" Use this bar to adjust multiplier for trigger buttons. This is only useful when the switch above is turned on"
Enable this to make your gamepad triggers analog, and pull down on them to adjust input.
Slide bar for adjusting Trigger Multiplier
Slide bar for adjusting Smoothening Multiplier
" Slide bar for adjusting Touch Multiplier"
Slide bar for adjusting Sensor Multiplier
Use this bar to adjust multiplier for Touchpad.
Slide bar for adjusting Touchpad Multiplier
Use this bar to adjust touchpad multiplier

Ads start loading only when you press the button to see it.
 This design choice avoids preloading ads, which can use unnecessary resources.
 Press the button again shortly if you wish to support.
 Thanks!
Tick to override volume buttons to do something else from below.
